testcase.name: User Adding Employee to the database
testcase.system-out: Given User open the "chrome" browser........................................passed Then User put his "Admin" and "admin123"....................................passed Then user click on login button.............................................passed Then user validate the page-title "OrangeHRM"...............................passed Given User click on "PIM" Module............................................passed And user click "Add Employee" on Top Bar Menu...............................passed And User put below employee details and add the new employee................passed And user verify the success message.........................................passed Then user click "Employee List" on Top Bar Menu.............................passed And User Search for created employee........................................passed And user click on "Search" button...........................................passed Then User Finds the searched employee in record table & click on checkbox and Trash button.passed Then user click on "Yes, Delete"............................................passed
